title: Alyssa Milano slams critics after tweeting about her kids' toys: 'Great job showing your hatefulness, Trump trolls'
text:
Alyssa Milano got upset when commenters on social media dismissed her call for less wasteful toy packaging. (Photo: REUTERS/Danny Moloshok)

Alyssa Milano has taken up a new cause: reducing the amount of plastic and waste used in toy packaging and manufacturing.

But the actress and activist’s call to arms over the issue — which she posted on Twitter after celebrating her two children’s birthdays over the weekend — didn’t get the warmest reception. While several critics accused Milano of complaining too much, some took the opportunity to attack her over her recent admission that she had two abortions in 1993.

We celebrated Milo & Bella’s Bdays yesterday. 💕



They’re opening their sweet gifts.



I’m so struck by the amount of plastic/waste.



If we want to start chipping away at the damage we’ve done to the planet, we should start regulating the materials we use to make & package toys. — Alyssa Milano (@Alyssa_Milano) September 1, 2019

Many fans agreed with her cause, but the tweet also sparked some negativity.

Yet you still buy them... — johanna 🇺🇸 (@johannaihli) September 1, 2019

Celebrate that their mother did not kill them. I hope they say a prayer for the 2 siblings their mother killed — elias (@elias_velez73) September 1, 2019

A 17 month old child was just injured in a terror attack, bragging about the birthday parties of rich children is not okay — DSA Come Take Them Caucus 🌹🔫🇺🇸 (@SatyrBagnat) September 1, 2019

Milano quickly responded to the “disgusting” comments by accusing critics — whom she slammed as “Trump trolls” — of “showing your hatefulness.”

The replies to this tweet from the trolls are disgusting. Great job showing your hatefulness, Trump Trolls! I will pray for you all tonight. To my God. The one that has empathy and compassion. — Alyssa Milano (@Alyssa_Milano) September 1, 2019

Her fans offered support and praised her for standing up for herself, though her reaction did prompt further backlash from some critics, one of whom shot back, “Too bad you didn’t have empathy and compassion for the babies you murdered.”

description: The actress and activist lashed out at negative responses to her tweet calling for less plastic waste in toy packaging, including a critic who brought up her past abortions.
